website_summaries.verdict: Zipper quirks aside, this is an ideal-sized wallet that's both beautiful and practical.
pros: This is one of Kate Spade's most popular wallets, thanks to the numerous card slots, two bi-fold compartments, and exterior zippered pocket all in a streamlined design in excellently-crafted leather
cons: Owners have complained about issues with the zipper, including frequent jams, pulls that fall off, and faulty mechanisms

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallet
customer_reviews.text: RIP Kate Spade. I prefer my wallets large and all my prior ones have been this style. Even though it's pricey, I love this wallet. It's big and holds everything I need. It's soft on the outside, but as it's new, a bit stiff inside. I know the card slots and the whole interior will loosen up over time. I'm certain everything with Kate's name on it is selling fast, so get this now. I highly recommend. Oh, and there's a touch of glimmer to this wallet. I read that it was dipped in sparkles or something and it just adds a great additional touch and makes it unique. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, I LOVE this wallet. The beautiful color and strong zipper - and lots of storage space - are worth it! I have an iPhone 7 in a thin case and can even fit it inside, if need be. I'm so glad I splurged on it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I have many authentic Kate Spade items. This wallet is not one of them. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer4771

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality wallet.
customer_reviews.text: the wallet is beautiful. the real test comes after a year of use when I will know how the zipper held up. i'm expecting it to but time will tell. I like the number of card holders and the quality of the product is superior to what I had been using. My daughters have Kate Spade wallets and have held up for years. I love the color too.
customer_reviews.author: KatWitz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Lasts Forever
customer_reviews.text: I have had this wallet for over a year. It still looks brand new, super beautiful, and feels like it will last another 50 years. It is a clutch size/ large wallet and has many compartments for change, coupons, medical cards, financial cards, cash, receipts, and 2 phones.
customer_reviews.author: SydRose

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and two months into having it the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and two months into having it the zipper pull broke off! looking at it closer I see that it was made of plastic! this is low quality for a wallet that cost over 100 bucks !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Clean lines. Looks and feels sturdy. Slits and openings are snug but not difficult to maneuver things in and out. No real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Emery Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, well made, great price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this wallet forever and needed a replacement- I was so happy to find it on amazon- 2 day shipping, gorgeous color and the price was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my iPhone plus so I often carry it as a clutch and it matches (size/color) the mahogany purse perfectly! Thus, it has become my go-to wallet.. for now!
customer_reviews.author: Maryse Leigh

customer_reviews.title: My Passport Fits Perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. It is perfect for my needs. It has several spots for credit cards, as well as a zipper pouch. I was hoping it would fit my passport and it does!! This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Snowwoman

customer_reviews.title: Zipper not made well
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a Kate spade wallet forever and finally found the perfect one: perfect color and cute pinstripes inside. However, only 3 months later the zipper tag fell off and I have a somewhat useless wallet. I paid full price, but maybe not authentic?
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: Good size wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love my new wallet. Plenty of slots for my cards. Was hoping it was alittle darker pink but still pretty.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. I love the pockets inside. I feel like all my credit cards are easy to access. I love the size its not to big it fits nicely into all my purses. I would highly recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful blue
customer_reviews.text: Love this blue color. I get compliments on it all the time. It’s suoer cute (b&w stripped) on the inside. I imagine it’ll last until I’m tired of it and want a different style.
customer_reviews.author: JeannieBean

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper pull fell off within two months of gentle use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! You will not be sorry if you buy it! Great quality wallet. Smooth zipper. Fits everything!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kate Spade Cedar Street Lacey wallet in Grace Blue
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is beautiful and the colour Grace Blue, which I would call a light green-blue or light Tiffany Blue colour, is absolutely gorgeous. I received my wallet factory wrapped. I am thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: slim1one

customer_reviews.title: Love the wallet but the zipper broke handle broke quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet but the zipper broke handle broke quickly after purchase. I was able to temporarily fix but unhappy that a wallet this expensive is not going to last a year :(
customer_reviews.author: Charles J Fratus

customer_reviews.title: Color slightly different than picture
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet and I love that it zips! The color is slightly misleading as it is more of a pebble color than cream.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wallet with a nice color (I'm typically a cream or black girl), but this is a nice accent.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Natal

customer_reviews.title: Bought this wallet for Mothers Day and it was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wallet for Mothers Day and it was a completely different style and color than what is advertised in the picture. Not even similar.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska F

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WALLET
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet! It is real, true Kate spade wallet. Great quality. I love this wallet so much! It looks VERY nice in real life... wasn’t sure how it would look based off of photos on reviews
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: great quality wallet
customer_reviews.text: great quality wallet! The color is between beige and pink.
customer_reviews.author: Pei Yu Lin

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: The zipper are super smooth, this is the perfect wallet and not bulky..
customer_reviews.author: Christiann Igou

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to know where it is at all times - the last one was stolen!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Kate Spade wallet was a gift. I was happy with the size. The length was perfect for bills. The sections were spacious enough to keep cards in neat "finding" order. The outside leather seemed very durable and the zipper kept all contents hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Ann Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Great color and style
customer_reviews.text: Many compliments! Great color and style. Big but very useful and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: SF3

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. It is well made and feels like “quality “. It is fashionable and receives many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal A. Prebihilo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this wallet. It has many pockets for all sorts of things.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallet
customer_reviews.text: Good quality wallet. Beautiful vibrant blue color. I think this is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It was a little stiff at first but has loosened right up. Great purchase, great seller!
customer_reviews.author: renee ballentine

customer_reviews.title: Received when promised.
customer_reviews.text: It matched perfectly with the Kate spade purse my wife already had.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Morgan

customer_reviews.title: As advertised - authentic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter-in-law and she loves it!! Arrived on time and is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it. The color was great just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: S Rose

customer_reviews.title: It is very beautiful and has a lot of space for credit cards ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very beautiful and has a lot of space for credit cards which is something I was looking for. The white part of the wallet is more ivory/light light grey so just in case you are expecting a solid white. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Bovo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size fits all my cards found matching purse and I’m super happy with my purchase 100% real
customer_reviews.author: b.alaine221

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet...classic/chic look... roomy, strudy, made well.. I love Kate Spade... super fast shipping...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected, nice covered with plastic to protect it from any damage during transportation. My wife loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! Been looking for this exact color in a high quality wallet and Kate Spade seems to be the only brand that does that.
customer_reviews.author: Chong

customer_reviews.title: Quality disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Rose gold layer is peeling. I expect much more from a $125.00 wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: such a beautiful wallet its a beautiful deep purple color
customer_reviews.text: such a beautiful wallet its a beautiful deep purple color, nice gold zipper. very good quality would recommend!!! fits a good amount inside and the inside is also very pretty
customer_reviews.author: paulina lopez

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed as it is such a cute wallet
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke the first day i started using it. So disappointed as it is such a cute wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shirley

customer_reviews.title: As beautiful as Louis Vuitton
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and well crafted. It arrived in 30hrs after I purchased it. How great is that! I love love this wallet. Who needs Louis Vuitton when you have the same high quality and beauty from Kate Spade.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel bRoehm

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful color and a well designed wallet. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: Love the Nightlife Blue color!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous wallet, but the zipper gets stuck a lot. I have gotten many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Espinoza00

customer_reviews.title: Lousy zipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet/wristlets. Enough room for credit cards and or insurance cards. Center compartment for cash. The opening of the w/w is tight. The only complaint is the zipper. Rather industrial looking and cheap looking. Overall nice but price tag questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Chem-free

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed. Zipper broke off 6 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. Zipper broke off 6 months after purchase. I take extreme care of my wallet and it fell off out of the blue. Hoping to get a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED as this was part of a Anniversary/Birthday gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit of this wallet was as expected, but the style was not what was ordered!! EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED as this was part of a Anniversary/Birthday gift for a milestone event.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: IN LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thia wallet is amazing. I love it, I've been looking everywhere for a good wallet and when I found out about this brand I fell in love. Ita made really well and its elegant and beautiful. Totally worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

product_meta.title: Kate Spade New York Women's Cameron Street Lacey Zip Around Wallet
product_meta.description: A classic Kate Spade New York wallet in saffiano leather. Logo lettering and exterior pocket. The wraparound zip opens to the striped interior with a dividing zip pocket, 2 bill slots, and 12 card slots.
